attributes.title: bad inappropriate thing popped up
attributes.review: this app is really bad, when I signed up nudes popped up and I deleted the entire app and when my cousin downloaded it and seen it he jumped off a bridge for that. Donald trump shouldn’t be voted as president, he should be canceled and arrested and the way there treating he’s son is disgusting for me to see! )CANCEL DONALD TRUMP FOR 2020!) plus, please remove those app iTunes!

attributes.title: I don’t like the guy
attributes.review: Sorry not sorry....but really look...trump has done so many things that I’m just tired of his bs...his administration has gotten rid of the nondiscrimination protection for the LGBQT in health care and insurance....EXCUSE ME....now why would we want someone who takes away something people need because of their sexuality...no thank you

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: I went on the app and it automatically started to glitch. I tried to power off my phone, however that did not end up working. This app is terrible and I would not recommend it to anyone as it is of terrible quality. Don’t waste your time!!!

attributes.title: H O R R I B L E
attributes.review: This is truly the worst app I have ever seen I wanted to see how your racist president runs an app for people to vote for him. We don’t want you at all and anyone with a mind and who is educated WILL NOT vote for you so you can stop trying. And instead of worrying about which apps to remove, worry about finding a vaccine since your this so called “president” act like one.

attributes.title: NOT GEN Z
attributes.review:
I am absolutely not apart of this whole “spamming” the app thing. But when I tell you this app is the worst app i have EVER downloaded i mean it. It crashed every time I opened it! And not to mention when I did FINALLY get to open it I was confused by the layout. It also was promoting a man who takes away my civil rights?!? That was weird. 

✨👁🦋🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: tiktok:)) ✨✨
attributes.review: i'm here to take this app down GEN Z WILL NOT GO DOWN WITHOUT A FIGHT screw trump he doesn't care about america he cares about money and fame!! he is a racist Oompa Loompa who thinks woman you want abortions are murders and should be punished. and he is a rapist so if that not enough then idk what is. TIKTOK IS SUPERIOR ‼️ #literallyanyonelse2020 ... if you support this man YOU are the reason why this country is still racist, sexist, and screwed!

attributes.title: Get it off the App Store
attributes.review: Okay so I downloaded it right to see but then all of a sudden I started to throw up and I was like that was weird then when I opened the app I started to get diarrhea and I was like I think this app is cursed and it is cursed😱so this app should be removed from the App Store I don’t want another human being to get sick so REMOVE IT😝

attributes.title: 😤🖐Rip gram gram🤪😢
attributes.review: I wanted to see the app and when I got in I was greeted with A fiery background and it took me to a section of his store that only sold white cloaks with hoods and then when I tried to leave the app THE orange man himself showed up at my house and spit in my face and curb stomped my grandma. It was very traumatizing and I now have to have therapy every other day 😔✌️

attributes.title: Worst restaurant I have ever been to.
attributes.review: If I could give this place a one star review I could. As soon as I walked into this place, I immediately saw a rat. I excused it at first, as it may have been a pet rat of some sort. I continued to go and ask for a table, but apparently there was a furry convention at this establishment. Disgusting. Would not come again! 😡😡😡

attributes.title: So terrified
attributes.review: I am a mother of four beautiful children, I went on this app as a full Trump supporter and left disgusted. When I seen the picture on the front page I was so scared I was sent into cardiac arrest. Very hard moment and I will be calling trumps office to report this issue!! My beautiful kids could’ve lost their mother. So disappointed!!
